mapper.select: SELECT qa.*, a.advert_sdate AS last_advert_sdate, a.advert_edate AS last_advert_edate FROM qrboard_area qa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT qrboard_area_idx, advert_sdate, advert_edate FROM advert WHERE advert_state = 3 ORDER BY advert_edate DESC LIMIT 1 ) a ON qa.qrboard_area_idx = a.qrboard_area_idx WHERE qa.qrboard_idx = #{qrboardIdx} ORDER BY qa.qrboard_area_seq

SELECT qa.*, a.content_idx, l.advert_sdate AS last_advert_sdate, l.advert_edate AS last_advert_edate FROM qrboard_area qa LEFT JOIN advert a ON qa.qrboard_area_idx = a.qrboard_area_idx AND a.advert_state = 3 AND now() BETWEEN advert_state AND advert_edate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT qrboard_area_idx, advert_sdate, advert_edate FROM advert WHERE advert_state = 3 ORDER BY advert_edate DESC LIMIT 1 ) l ON qa.qrboard_area_idx = l.qrboard_area_idx WHERE qa.qrboard_idx = #{qrboardIdx} ORDER BY qa.qrboard_area_seq
SELECT * FROM content_text WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_text_idx
SELECT * FROM content_image WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_image_idx
SELECT * FROM content_background WHERE content_idx = #{contentIdx} ORDER BY content_background_idx
